Joi's Boiled Corn

Directions

Boil water in Dutch Oven.

Add ¼ cup of butter and some pepper.

Turn off heat and add corn.

Allow to sit for 20 min.

Remove corn and season with salt.

Ingredients

Corn

Butter

Salt

Pepper
